title: Purse, 1830–60
medium:
Medium: silk, metal beads
Technique: beaded crochet
description: Small flat bag of crocheted silk attached at the top to two gold bars with filligree balls at the ends, with a gold sliding ring. The design is composed of horizontal bands of geometric design in black, orange and off-white with gold-colored and cut steel beads. Looped beaded fringe at bottom alternates strings of cut steel with gold-colored beads.

tombstone.epitaph:
Purse, 1830–60.
1830–60. Medium: silk, metal beads
Technique: beaded crochet. Gift of Mrs. Albert Blum. 1953-106-10.
